ComicInfo.Title: What You'll Really Miss after You Graduate; Cracked's Early Warning Signs of No Respect; The True Story of the Lone Ranger; The Falling Guy; Cracked Interviews the Outdoor King; The Wider World of Sports; The Making of Jawz #23; Mr. Kong Goes to Town; One Day on Route 14
ComicInfo.Summary:
British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.The Lone Ranger goes on the record with the truth about Tonto's real name and his rivalry with Roy Rogers.
Parody of the TV show The Fall Guy
parody of the Jaws film series
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:43:16. [Issue ID 250559]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Don Orehek,John Langton,Brian Buniak,John Severin,Bill Ward,Michael Ricigliano
ComicInfo.Inker: Don Orehek,John Langton,Brian Buniak,John Severin,Bill Ward,Michael Ricigliano
